definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Song of the Earth/Das Lied von der Erde
the great Shaanxi earthquake of 2nd February 1556 that killed 830,000 people

sentences.english: Earth is just a dead thing you can claim.
sentences.chinese: 大地只不过是你能占有的死物。

sentences.english: Now the first bolt of lightning stabs the earth .
sentences.chinese: 这时，第一个雷电劈向大地。

sentences.english: Even while the earth sleeps we travel.
sentences.chinese: 我们会日夜兼程，即便大地还在熟睡。

sentences.english: Goes all over the fields and leaves A white cap on every stump.
sentences.chinese: 走遍大地不稍停，留下白帽一顶顶。

sentences.english: It is the tea of the earth that keep here smiles in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 是大地的泪点，使她的微笑连结着青春不谢。

sentences.english: It is the terms of the earth that kept her smiles in bloom .
sentences.chinese: 大地的泪珠，使她的微笑如花一般灿烂不谢。

sentences.english: Different type of silver deposits is under the control of different geotectonic environments.
sentences.chinese: 不同大地构造环境控制了不同类型的银矿床。

sentences.english: Without knowing it, you'll fall in love with the earth you're standing on.
sentences.chinese: 不自觉之间，你会爱上你踏足的大地。

sentences.english: With desolation shall the earth be laid waste, and it shall be utterly spoiled: for the Lord hath spoken this word.
sentences.chinese: 大地必要完全荒废，惨遭浩劫，因为上主这样定了。

sentences.english: The magic of first-house land wizards is necessary to remove it.
sentences.chinese: 必须使用第一护院大地巫师的魔法方能清除。

sentences.english: While Jove 's planet rises yonder, silent over Africa.
sentences.chinese: 当朱匹特的行星高高升起，默默凝照着非洲的大地。

sentences.english: Thunder roared and shook the earth.
Influence of the terrestrial heat flow on the evolution of the surface ecosystem and environment.
sentences.chinese: 试论大地热流对地表环境与生态演变的影响。

sentences.english: The trees, like the longings of the earth, stand on tiptoe to peep at the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 树木就像要表达大地的愿望似的，踮起脚来探望苍穹。

definition: left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild
